newsitem.title: CHINA: PRESS DIGEST - Shanghai newspapers - April 16.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Shanghai newspapers - April 16.

text.p: Following is a summary of major political and business stories in local newspapers, prepared by Reuters in Shanghai. Reuters has not checked the stories and does not guarantee their accuracy.
- SHANGHAI SECURITIES NEWS - China's local currency interbank market based in Shanghai has admitted securities brokerages, including Shenyin & Wanguo Securities Co, as second-tier members.
- Pudong maps out development plan for 1997 with the focus on encouraging large-scale investment projects of over $10 billion.
- Editorial criticises some securities brokerages for failing to educate investors about stock market risk.
- BUSINESS NEWS - Officials participating in a recent seminar in Beijing stressed the necessity of strengthening risk controls over financial markets.
- The local Shanghai government has established a special bureau to promote the city's tourist industry.
